SEARCH
Package controller

Class InternshipManager

Object
InternshipManager
public class InternshipManager extends Object
Controller class to manage the creation, filtering, and status of internships.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Map<String,Internship>
    internships
    In-memory map of all internships, keyed by Internship ID.

  • Method Details

    • createInternship

      public void createInternship(String title, String description, Internship.InternshipLevel level, String major, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, CompanyRepresentative rep, int slots)
      Creates a new internship and adds it to the map.
      Parameters:
      title - Title.
      description - Description.
      level - Level.
      major - Major.
      openDate - Open date.
      closeDate - Close date.
      rep - The representative posting the job.
      slots - Number of slots.

    • toggleVisibility

      public boolean toggleVisibility(String internshipId)
      Toggles the visibility of an internship.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - The internship ID.
      Returns:
      true on success, false if internship not found.

    • getInternshipsForStudent

      public List<Internship> getInternshipsForStudent(Student s)
      Gets a filtered list of internships available to a specific student.
      Parameters:
      s - The student.
      Returns:
      A list of eligible and visible internships.

    • filterInternships

      public List<Internship> filterInternships(String major, Internship.InternshipLevel level, Internship.InternshipStatus status)
      Gets a filtered list of internships based on criteria (for staff reports).
      Parameters:
      major - The major to filter by (or null).
      level - The level to filter by (or null).
      status - The status to filter by (or null).
      Returns:
      A list of matching internships.

    • getInternshipById

      public Internship getInternshipById(String internshipId)
      Gets a single internship by ID.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - The internship ID.
      Returns:
      The Internship object, or null.

    • getInternshipsByCompany

      public List<Internship> getInternshipsByCompany(String compName)
      Gets all internships posted by a specific company.
      Parameters:
      compName - The company name.
      Returns:
      A list of internships.

    • getAllInternships

      public Collection<Internship> getAllInternships()
      Gets all internships in the system, after updating expired ones.
      Returns:
      A collection of all internships.

    • updateExpiredInternships

      private void updateExpiredInternships()
      Private helper to check for and close internships past their deadline.
